title: Divine Love Meditation - Sound Healing Miami
description: Activating the magic of being YOU!
text:

Sound healing is a gentle yet profound practice, offers us a unique chance to break free from limiting beliefs, releasing past traumas, and dissolving emotional patterns that is no longer serving us.
It aids in soothing our anxious hearts, calming our restless minds, and alleviating the tension...
💚Heart Chakra / Anahata💚
4th of our energetic system. Located at the center of the chest. It governs love, compassion, empathy, forgiveness, & emotional balance.
✨balanced, you experience deep love for yourself and others. You are compassionate, empathetic, able to forgive. Your heart is open,...
A beautiful private sound healing session for 4 high-performance professionals!
What a pleasure this session was! 🧘🏼♂️💫
1-1 privates, group privates, corporations or events in Aspen till September 7th. 💕🗓️
Sending you all so much love & light!
This private sound healing session was beyond magical! We incorporated theta healing and the results were just so impressive and magical. There’s very few words I can use to describe it, the transformation and experience truly speaks for itself. 🔊💖✨
I am so grateful for being able to open up t...

✨When balance you feel confident, balance, motivated, you have a healthy self-steam, self worth & a sense/feeling...
I am so grateful for @jankowskicynthia 💖 thank you for opening the doors of @aspenhive for a beautiful Sound Healing & Cacao Ceremony experience! ☕️💖🔊
We created space to receive the medicine of cacao to open our hearts and allow ourselves to receive the beautiful sound healing frequencies an...
Yesterday I had the honor to host a private cacao ceremony + Sound healing for a private group of 5 in magical Aspen. 🔊💖✨ I love doing heart opening practices!
Truly love being able to facilitate this sacred space, and bringing harmony and balance to the mind, body and spirit through a beauti...
- Andrea CWow! I have no words to describe my sound healing experience with Laura. It was incredible. It was my first time taking a private lesson and I was blown away! I am a marathon runner who is currently getting over a stress fracture. Laura completely tailored the session to support that area and focused on the root chakra. I was able to feel the vibrations all over my body and pictured how all the cells of my bones were regenerating. It was an incredible experience that I cannot fully explain. You need to try it for yourself and experience your own personal journey.
- Brennan BI recently had the pleasure of attending Laura's sound healing class, and I must say it was an extraordinary experience. Laura's classes are truly one of a kind, and every session feels like a magical journey. From the moment I arrived, I felt a sense of calm and tranquility. Laura's warm and welcoming energy immediately put me at ease. The class itself was a beautiful blend of sound and relaxation techniques, designed to promote healing and rejuvenation. The sounds of the various instruments, including crystal bowls, chimes and drums, were incredibly soothing and transported me to a deeply relaxed state. I could feel the stress and tension melting away as the vibrations of the sound washed over me. What sets Laura's classes apart is her ability to create a safe and supportive environment that allows for a truly transformative experience. I left the class feeling refreshed, recharged, and renewed. If you're looking for a unique and powerful healing experience, I highly recommend a...
- Jenifer PI’ve been to more than one sound healing experience and by far Laura’s session was the best one! She really does a great job connecting with you through her sounds and you feel comfortable and at peace. She also has such a great personality to add to it that you’ll feel very connected with her.
